mapper.select: select * from user where regID is not null and appVersion > '1.33'
select * from user where regID is not null and isDeleted is null and appVersion > '1.37'
select * from user where regID is not null and userID=#{userID} and isDeleted is null and appVersion > '1.37'
select u.*, ul.address from user u left outer join user_location ul on u.userID = ul.userID and ul.locationName='현재위치' order by u.createdDate desc limit 0, 200

select u.userID, u.userName, ul.latitude as lat, ul.longitude as lng from user u left outer join user_location ul on u.userID = ul.userID and ul.locationName='현재위치' where isDeleted is null order by u.createdDate desc
select * from user where appVersion > 1.52 and isDeleted is null

select sum(i), sum(d), (1.0 - (sum(d)*0.1)/(sum(i)*0.1))*100 from ( select count(userNo) as i, 0 as d from user where isDeleted is null and left(createdDate, 10)=left(NOW(),10) union select 0 as i, count(userNo) as d from user where isDeleted='Y' and left(createdDate,10)=LEFT(NOW(),10) ) A

select sum(i), sum(d), (1.0 - (sum(d)*0.1)/(sum(i)*0.1))*100 from ( select count(userNo) as i, 0 as d from user where isDeleted is null and left(createdDate, 10)=left( DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{value} DAY),10) union select 0 as i, count(userNo) as d from user where isDeleted='Y' and left(createdDate,10)=LEFT( DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{value} DAY),10) ) A
select * from region where regionName=#{regionName} and level=#{level}
select * from region where regionName=#{regionName} and level=#{level} and parentNo=#{parentNo}
select * from region where regionName like concat(#{regionName},'%') and level=#{level} limit 0, 1
select * from region where regionName like concat(#{regionName},'%') and level=#{level} and parentNo=#{parentNo} limit 0, 1
mapper.insert: insert into region(regionName, level, code , parentNo ) value (#{regionName}, #{level}, #{code}, #{parentNo});

insert into post_region(postID, regionName, lRegionNo , mRegionNo, sRegionNo, tRegionNo, latitude, longitude, address, createdDate) value (#{postID}, #{regionName}, #{lRegionNo}, #{mRegionNo}, #{sRegionNo}, #{tRegionNo}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{address}, NOW());
delete from post_region where postID=#{postID} and regionName=#{regionName}
insert into history(name, param1, param2, param3, param4, createdDate ) value (#{name}, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, NOW() );
